languages.text: Отчет разведчиков оставляет Абеляра в смешанных чувствах. Несмотря на уверенность в том, что Ее Светлость Теодора не поступила бы так со своими людьми без причины, он мрачен, как утративший веру миссионер.

traits.locale_text: Отчет разведчиков оставляет Абеляра в смешанных чувствах. Несмотря уверенность в том, что Ее Светлость Теодора не поступила бы так со своими людьми без причины, он мрачен, как утративший веру миссионер.

languages.text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.
languages.original_text: Отчет разведчиков оставляет Абеляра в смешанных чувствах. Несмотря на уверенность в том, что Ее Светлость Теодора не поступила бы так со своими людьми без причины, он мрачен, как утративший веру миссионер.

traits.locale_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without a very good reason to, he is as gloomy as a missionary who lost his faith.

The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without a very good reason to, he is as gloomy as a missionary who lost his faith.

The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

languages.text: 侦察队的报告让阿贝拉德心烦意乱。尽管他相信，西奥多拉夫人肯定是有着充分的理由才会下达这样的命令，但他的表情依旧像信仰破灭的传教士一样阴沉。
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

traits.locale_text: 侦察队的报告让阿贝拉德心烦意乱。尽管他相信，西奥多拉夫人肯定是有着充分的理由才会下达这样的命令，但他的表情依旧像信仰破灭的传教士一样阴沉。

languages.text: 偵察兵の報告に、アベラルドは葛藤を覚える。シオドーラ夫人がよほどの理由がなければこのような命令を下すはずがないと確信しているにもかかわらず、アベラルドの表情は信仰を失った伝道師のように沈痛だ。
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

traits.locale_text: 偵察兵の報告に、アベラルドは葛藤を覚える。シオドーラ夫人がよほどの理由がなければこのような命令を下すはずがないと確信しているにもかかわらず、アベラルドの表情は信仰を失った伝道師のように沈痛だ。

languages.text: El informe de los exploradores deja a Abelard con sentimientos contradictorios. A pesar de su certeza de que lady Teodora no daría tal orden sin una muy buena razón, la expresión de Abelard es sombría como la de un misionero que ha perdido la fe.
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

traits.locale_text: El informe de los exploradores deja a Abelard con sentimientos contradictorios. A pesar de su certeza de que lady Teodora no daría tal orden sin una muy buena razón, la expresión de Abelard es sombría como la de un misionero que ha perdido la fe.

languages.text: Der Bericht der Kundschafter löst in Abelard widersprüchliche Gefühle aus. Trotz seiner Überzeugung, dass ihre Ladyschaft Theodora einen solchen Befehl nie ohne sehr guten Grund geben würde, ist Abelards Ausdruck so düster wie der eines Missionars, der seinen Glauben verloren hat.
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

traits.locale_text: Der Bericht der Kundschafter löst in Abelard widersprüchliche Gefühle aus. Trotz seiner Überzeugung, dass ihre Ladyschaft Theodora einen solchen Befehl nie ohne sehr guten Grund geben würde, ist Abelards Ausdruck so düster wie der eines Missionars, der seinen Glauben verloren hat.

languages.text: Le rapport des éclaireurs suscite chez Abélard une réaction mitigée. S'il est convaincu que Sa Seigneurie Théodora devait avoir de bonnes raisons d'en arriver là, son expression n'est pas sans évoquer celle d'un missionnaire qui aurait perdu la foi.
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.

traits.locale_text: Le rapport des éclaireurs suscite chez Abélard une réaction mitigée. S'il est convaincu que Sa Seigneurie Théodora devait avoir de bonnes raisons d'en arriver là, son expression n'est pas sans évoquer celle d'un missionnaire qui aurait perdu la foi.

languages.text: Keşif erlerinin raporu, Abelard'ı çelişkili duygular içinde bırakıyor. Leydi Theodora Hazretleri'nin çok iyi bir sebep olmaksızın böyle bir emir vermeyeceğinden emin olsa da Abelard'ın ifadesi, inancını kaybetmiş bir misyonerin kasvetini taşıyor.
languages.original_text: The scouts' report leaves Abelard with conflicting feelings. Despite his certainty that Her Ladyship Theodora would not give such an order without very good reason, Abelard's expression is sombre like a missionary who lost his faith.
